extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     LING100 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.

basic.description: This course provides a foundation in principles of morphological analysis. Topics covered include inflectional and derivational morphology as well as the morphology-syntax and morphology-phonology interfaces. Emphasis is placed on practical discovery method, and formal analysis and explanation.
basic.subject: LING
basic.title: Morphology
